title: Cake POS ( Restaurant Point of Sale System )
description: Integrated online ordering, curbside management, reservations, and more. Simplify operations, quickly edit menus, and manage orders with ease. Automate time tracking, payroll, and tip sharing for seamless staff management. Role: Develop UI component libraries and user interfaces; perform structural and visual testing; create views for testing in React Storybook; wireframe and design mockups for new features.
